title: GAME CRASHING / DISCONNECTING IN CHAMP SELECT
body:
As you can see my game has been crashing during champion select or when loading into the game i get a black screen of death soon notified with a network error.... VERY MANY TIMES
im up to a 30 minute que ban right now and its really really making me angry... ive never ever had problems before this patch and now im having quite a bit. i have 120 fps constanly and always 70 ping conection isnt an issue for me and computer preformance istn either i have an I5 8gb ram.
please someone help me i have repaired my game files as well... still no help

replies.body:
Hey cobbel,

It sucks to get this error message in particular, given how extremely unhelpful it is.  Fortunately, we should be able to get this solved!

Almost every single error in Champion Selection is usually caused by some sort of connection issue.  Essentially, your computer needs to maintain a consistent and constant connection with our servers.  If this is interrupted at all, error messages like this appear.  To try to prevent this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are a lot of steps here, but all of them are common solutions to these types of errors.

Hopefully this helps!  Let us know if it doesn't!

I completely understand where your frustration is coming from, especially if you've tried every single step there.  I by no means claim that the issue is completely on your end, but we want to rule out as many root causes as possible.

In order to do this and dig a little more in-depth as to what could be the problem, can you make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)?  Include the following logs and one of our Tech Specialists should be able to investigate a bit further:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
